snippet: “We’re going to have to do something that’s pretty hard. Pretty, pretty, pretty hard, to quote Larry David.” — Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont, at the Democratic National Committee’s Women’s Leadership Forum on Friday.
abstract: “We’re going to have to do something that’s pretty hard. Pretty, pretty, pretty hard, to quote Larry David.” — Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont, at the Democratic National Committee’s Women’s Leadership Forum on Friday.

headline.main: Verbatim: When Bernie Sanders Portrays Larry David
